alert.note: Alert for Barnes; Ransom; Richland; Sargent (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 19 at 2:08PM CST by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER IMPACTS EXPECTED THIS WEEK... Multiple winter weather systems are expected to impact the area this week. Initially a clipper system will move through tonight into Monday night bringing gusty northerly winds to the area Monday evening. Drifting snow, and areas of blowing snow will be possible. A second system tied to a larger storm system will impact the area Tuesday through Thursday. This system will bring a period of snow Tuesday with gusty winds and blowing snow potential Tuesday evening. Another round of winter weather will impact the area later Wednesday into Thursday. This could bring additional snow accumulations and blowing snow potential. Hazardous winter conditions will be possible at times across the region with all of these rounds of winter weather. Please monitor weather.gov/fgf for the latest forecasts regarding these potential winter weather impacts.
